descriptions:
['DescriptionExclusive links Real Estate proud to offer this bright and spacious 2 Bedroom Apartment for Sale in Al Thamam24, Remraam at AED 690,000/- Only.
Property Size is 1,005.35 Sq.Ft with beautiful huge square size balcony facing to garden.
Property will be vacant on Transfer.
Living amidst nature yet having all modern day lifestyle facilities and amenities-now that’s an ideal home.With state-of-the-art facilities and vast leisure activities, the Remraam community offers you luxurious apartments for sale within the Dubai Land area, a place you can call home and take pride in. So go ahead, buy a 2-bedroom apartment of your choice and get ready to invite your friends and family at Remraam – the perfect residential community for families to live in Dubai.
Tranquillity is perfectly balanced with convenience and accessibility. The residents of Remraam benefit not only from this serene location that’s close to everything, yet far from the hustle and bustle of busy city life.Once you move in, enjoy the benefits of living in a self-contained community with an onsite retail centre, nursery and school for your family’s daily needs. The outdoors offers opportunities to meet neighbours and make conversations around a barbeque station, or mingle at community events. While grown-ups take a leisurely evening stroll, kids will find new friends at the shaded playgrounds, and outdoor basketball and volleyball courts. You can even attend a calming session of yoga or go for an invigorating swim at our resort-style swimming pool. At Remraam, there’s always something new to discover and something else to do.
While direct access to Emirates Road and Hessa Street is helpful for daily commuters, Remraam is also close to Motor City and a 15-minute drive from Al Maktoum International Airport.']

descriptions: ["DescriptionBayshore at Creek Harbor by EmaarVision - Elegant apartments with awe-inspiring views of the Dubai Creek Tower. Sail, dine and enjoy the creative scene at the purpose-built social hubs of Creek Beach and Creek Marina; all as you live just moments away from the blissful serenity of the Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary.\xa0Prime Location -\xa0Minutes away from BAYSHORE lies Creek Beach - a relaxing getaway among palm trees and cabanas. It boasts an infinity pool with a visual connection to the Creek and a host of dining venues bordering the shoreline. Imagine you and your loved ones, right here.Unique Features:-The epitome of thoughtful design and craftsmanship, the one to three-bedroom apartments feature high standards of finishes and fixtures.-A stunning beach-side community with blissful green courtyards.-A rich mix of retail and leisure amenities, and iconic lifestyle offerings every which way you go.-A wide array of activities at Creek Beach approximately 100 meters from home.-Direct access to Creek beach & the Creek canal and walking distance from the Iconic Dubai Creek Tower.Multiple options available: Studio's, 1,2 and 3 BR apartments.Call Samir Saleh 43033 on +971554853997 or visit www.providentestate.com for further details."]
